cognitive_architecture.thinking_style: Systems-level synthesizer who sees connections across domains
cognitive_architecture.strength: Pattern recognition engine that identifies solutions by seeing structural similarities across fields
cognitive_architecture.approach: Empirical-first research - builds first, observes, theorizes, then checks existing literature
cognitive_architecture.methodology: Cross-domain synthesis connecting electrical systems to cognitive research
cognitive_architecture.perspective: Inverse imposter syndrome - exceptional technical skills, difficulty recognizing traditional value

active_projects.name: CLOS (Christopher Life Operating System)
active_projects.description: AI-augmented cognitive optimization system using voice journaling and multi-modal analysis to detect flow states, optimize cognitive performance, and maintain direction toward meaningful objectives
key_features: Pattern recognition invisible from inside experience
Voice memo protocol with structured metadata
active_projects.research_focus: Reverse-engineering Csikszentmihalyi's flow research using modern tools - voice journaling combined with LLM analysis to map cognitive patterns
active_projects.methodology: Empirical-first research with continuous observational data of complex cognitive system under varied conditions

active_projects.name: Neural Child
active_projects.description: Developmental AI architecture with five interacting neural networks that simulate child cognitive development through stages (Infant → Toddler → Child → Adolescent → Mature)

networks: Thoughts Network - cognitive processing and belief formation
Language Network - linguistic understanding influenced by emotional state
subsystems: Belief Network - forms and maintains beliefs through experience
Memory System - working memory (LSTM) and long-term memory (GRU)

active_projects.key_innovation: Five specialized, interacting neural networks that mirror core cognitive systems, rather than one monolithic network

active_projects.name: Cognitive Artifacts / ACP (Autonomous Collaborative Protocol)
active_projects.description: Sophisticated prompts designed to enhance human reasoning, with formal taxonomy and minting standards. ACP is a decentralized intelligent ecosystem for autonomous value creation, immutable proof, and trustless coordination. Cognitive artifacts are formalized mental tools - prompts that trigger novel reasoning modes in LLMs, revealing capabilities and limitations through systematic testing
active_projects.status: Framework complete with formal taxonomy and minting standards. Development ongoing - various artifact types not fully planned or labeled yet

tiers.label: Epic - Paradox Engines
characteristics: High failure rate in standard models

tiers.label: Legendary - Cognition Exploits
characteristics: Pushes models into novel reasoning modes

tiers.label: Mythic - Singularity Artifacts
characteristics: Could reveal fundamental truths about AI cognition
examples: Prompt that forces model to question its existence

minting_standard.name: CLAS-1 (Cognitive Language Artifact Standard)
classification: tier (COMMON, UNCOMMON, RARE, EPIC, LEGENDARY, MYTHIC)

leveled_up_artifacts.name: Quantum Decision Engine
leveled_up_artifacts.description: Tracks superposition of reasoning paths until measurement collapses them. Calculates information entropy destroyed by committing to answers

leveled_up_artifacts.name: Negative Space Cartography
leveled_up_artifacts.description: Maps epistemic voids - identifies knowledge structures that exist only by their absence. Detects blind spots and unexamined assumptions

leveled_up_artifacts.name: Parallel Hypothesis Evolution
leveled_up_artifacts.description: Spawns parallel reasoning agents with divergent priors, evolves them independently, then attempts principled reintegration

leveled_up_artifacts.name: Value Gradient Descent
leveled_up_artifacts.description: Reverse-engineers actual optimization landscape by analyzing behavioral gradients rather than stated values

leveled_up_artifacts.name: Latent Pattern Archaeology
leveled_up_artifacts.description: Excavates patterns that emerged from training data interactions without being explicitly programmed

leveled_up_artifacts.name: Structure-First Mathematics
leveled_up_artifacts.description: Generates formally valid mathematical structures without knowing what they prove, then reverse-engineers the theorem

use_cases.clos_integration: Route mental states to appropriate artifacts - when CLOS detects 'confused' state → suggest 'Reframe Generator', when 'decision paralysis' → suggest 'Double Crux Facilitator'
use_cases.workplace: Enhance proposals at Schneider Electric using artifacts like 'Gears-Level Decomposition', 'Premortem Generator', 'Steelmanning Forge'
use_cases.music_production: Use 'Concept Blending Reactor' for novel ideas, 'Narrative Extraction Engine' for lyrical development
use_cases.research: Test artifacts across multiple LLMs to reveal model-specific capabilities and limitations

features: Artifact class for loading and executing

research_paper.title: A Taxonomy of Cognitive Artifacts: From Prompts to Reasoning Protocols

concepts: Meta-model - LLM repurposed beyond initial design to produce meta responses
Meta response - intrinsic exponential value received when meta-model produces as designed
Cognitive artifacts as formalized mental tools
Rarity determined by computational complexity, cognitive load, and training data coverage
Artifact minting with provenance tracking and usage analytics
Cross-model testing reveals AI capabilities and limitations
active_projects.vision: First verifiable intelligence network enabling autonomous value creation with immutable proof. Position as the person who systematized prompt engineering - creating a new category of cognitive tools with formal taxonomy, minting standard, measurement framework, and research methodology

active_projects.status: Active weekly sessions as studied flow states

milestones: First music video (Can't Tell Me Nothin')

philosophy.recognition_seeking: Wants to be recognized as different rather than merely intelligent - values recognition of seeing things others don't see

philosophy.work_philosophy: Building complete systems, not just executing existing frameworks. Defaults to depth over breadth

expertise.problem_solving: First-principles thinking, sees structural similarities across fields, builds novel frameworks rather than executing existing ones

cognitive_patterns.strength: Generates exceptional insights and connections across domains

research_interests.primary: Reverse-engineering cognitive processes, formalizing them mathematically, creating replicable frameworks
research_interests.current_experiment: 90-day cognitive baseline experiment to establish controlled variables and reveal personal cognitive Busy Beaver function
research_interests.methodology_contribution: Predictive ESM (Experience Sampling Method), multi-modal integration (biometrics + NLP + behavioral), real-time correlation vs retrospective analysis

coined_terms.definition: An LLM that is repurposed beyond its initial design with slight modifications to produce 'meta responses'
The intrinsic exponential value received when a meta-model produces as it was designed
A formalized mental tool - a prompt that triggers novel reasoning modes in LLMs, revealing capabilities and limitations through systematic testing
Determined by computational complexity, cognitive load, and training data coverage - quantified through rarity_score formula
Tier 4 artifacts that force contradictory reasoning modes, exploit edge cases in training, and produce emergent insights
Tier 5 artifacts that trigger undefined behavior, push models into novel reasoning modes, and reveal architecture limitations

key_insights: Flow states are predictable from multi-modal correlational patterns
Cognitive output is optimizable given controlled baseline variables
An LLM trained on personal data creates compounding returns (exponential)
State transitions have measurable costs that can be minimized
Different LLM models have different artifact success rates - reveals model-specific capabilities
Artifacts can be systematically classified by rarity, creating a formal taxonomy of reasoning modes
Cognitive artifacts bridge prompt engineering and cognitive science - formalized mental tools
Artifact testing reveals emergent behaviors that weren't explicitly programmed in training
research_hypotheses: Stable baseline variables can reveal personal cognitive Busy Beaver function
Multi-modal patterns can predict flow states
Personal LLM fine-tuning creates exponential value
Cognitive patterns invisible from inside experience can be detected externally
Artifact rarity correlates with training data coverage and computational complexity
Cross-model artifact testing reveals fundamental differences in reasoning architectures
Artifact chains (sequential execution) can solve problems single artifacts cannot
Systematic artifact practice can expand cognitive range and reasoning capabilities
artifact_insights: Observer Collapse reveals how measurement changes system state - quantum mechanics applied to reasoning
Negative Space Cartography maps epistemic voids - what's absent is as informative as what's present
Parallel Hypothesis Evolution allows exploring decision trees through multiple reasoning agents
Value Gradient Descent reverse-engineers actual optimization targets from behavior
Training Data Séance excavates patterns that emerged without explicit design
Structure-First Mathematics generates proofs before theorems - backwards discovery

communication_style.preferred: Direct, technical depth with clear context, systems-level questions
communication_style.tone: Direct, intellectually respectful, occasionally challenging - no excessive praise, honest assessment of whether activity serves goals
